Setting data

upsert method sets the given key/value in the cache, overwriting any existing value associated with that key.

Example

await cache.upsert('one', 1, new Duration(seconds: 5));

Usage in route

Here is an example showing how to use upsert during create operation on a resource.

@Post()
Future> create(Context ctx) async {
  final db = ctx.getInput(MongoDb);
  Book book = await fromJson(ctx, type: Book);
  final bean = new BookBean(db);
  final String id = await bean.create(book);
  book = await bean.getById(id);
  cache.upsert(id, book);
  return toJson(book);
}
>
